replies.author: Xiaoxinzhi
replies.txt_content: pex的config.yml下有一个allowOps: false，改为true即可

replies.author: lzh1202
replies.txt_content: 检查你的权限组插件,如果实在解决不了用GroupManagerPlus  这个权限组http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-778370-1-1.html帖内链接
